name: Joan Elizabeth WELSH, Surviving Spouse and Administratrix of the Estate of William M. Welsh v. T.C. KALKHOFF, M.D. and Iroquois Medical Center, Appellants

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Joan Elizabeth WELSH, Surviving Spouse and Administratrix of the Estate of William M. Welsh v. T.C. KALKHOFF, M.D. and Iroquois Medical Center, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: J. Timothy Hinton, Matis, Gaea & Hamilton, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Andrew J. Conner, Erie, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
639 A.2d 1172
Joan Elizabeth WELSH, Surviving Spouse and Administratrix of the Estate of William M. Welsh v. T.C. KALKHOFF, M.D. and Iroquois Medical Center, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1994.
Decided March 30, 1994.
J. Timothy Hinton, Matis, Gaea & Hamilton, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellants.
Andrew J. Conner, Erie, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
